00005 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00006 LABHistogram2D::LABHistogram2D(void) {
00007         /* hue varies from 0 (~0°red) to 180 (~360°red again) */
00008         /* saturation varies from 0 (black-gray-white) to 255 (pure spectrum color) */
00009     int hist_size[] = {a_bins, b_bins};
00010         float a_ranges[] = { (float)a_min, (float)a_max }; /* A varies from a_min to a_max */
00011         float b_ranges[] = { (float)b_min, (float)b_max }; /* B varies from b_min to b_max */
00012         float* ranges[] = { a_ranges, b_ranges };
00013         h = cvCreateHist( 2, hist_size, CV_HIST_ARRAY, ranges, 1 );
00014         cvClearHist(h);
00015 }
00016 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 LABHistogram2D::LABHistogram2D(const LABHistogram2D& that) {
00018         cvCopyHist(that.h, &this->h);
00019 }
00020 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021 LABHistogram2D& LABHistogram2D::operator=(const LABHistogram2D& that) {
00022         cvCopyHist(that.h, &this->h);
00023         return *this;
00024 }
00025 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00026 LABHistogram2D::~LABHistogram2D() {
00027         cvReleaseHist(&h);
00028 }
00029 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 void LABHistogram2D::Clear() {
00031         cvClearHist(h);
00032 }
00033 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 double LABHistogram2D::GetValue(double a, double b) {
00035         if (a < a_min || a >= a_max || b < b_min || b >= b_max)
00036                 return 0;
00037         int A = (int)((a-a_min)*a_bins/(a_max-a_min));
00038         int B = (int)((b-b_min)*b_bins/(b_max-b_min));
00039         return cvQueryHistValue_2D(h, A, B);
00040 }
00041 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 double LABHistogram2D::GetValue(CvScalar bgr) {
00043         double lab[3];
00044         RGB2Lab(bgr.val[2], bgr.val[1], bgr.val[0], lab);
00045         return GetValue(lab[1], lab[2]);
00046 }
00047 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 void LABHistogram2D::AddValue(CvScalar bgr) {
00049         double lab[3];
00050         RGB2Lab(bgr.val[2], bgr.val[1], bgr.val[0], lab);
00051         if (lab[1] < a_min || lab[1] >= a_max || lab[2] < b_min || lab[2] >= b_max)
00052                 return;
00053         int A = (int)((lab[1]-a_min)*a_bins/(a_max-a_min));
00054         int B = (int)((lab[2]-b_min)*b_bins/(b_max-b_min));
00055         float* value = cvGetHistValue_2D(h, A, B);
00056         (*value)++;
00057 }
00058 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 void LABHistogram2D::Serialize( CArchive& ar )
00060 {
00061     if( !CV_IS_HIST(h))
00062         ASSERT(false);
00063         
00064         int size[CV_MAX_DIM];
00065     int dims = cvGetDims( this->h->bins, size );
00066         int total = 1;
00067         for(int i = 0; i < dims; i++ )
00068                 total *= size[i];
00069 
00071         //total = 30*30;
00072         float *ptr = 0;
00073     cvGetRawData( this->h->bins, (uchar**)&ptr);
00074         if (ar.IsStoring()) {
00075                 for(int i = 0; i < total; i++ )
00076                         ar << ptr[i];
00077         }
00078         else {
00079                 for(int i = 0; i < total; i++ )
00080                         ar >> ptr[0];
00081         }
00082         
00083 }
00084 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 void LABHistogram2D::Draw(IplImage* frame, int scale, CvPoint p) {
00086         int iscale = scale, jscale = scale;
00087         if (scale == 0) {
00088                 iscale = frame->width/a_bins;
00089                 jscale = frame->height/b_bins;
00090         }
00091         else {
00092                 iscale = scale; jscale = scale;
00093         }
00094 
00095         float min_val = 0, max_val = 0;
00096         cvGetMinMaxHistValue( h, &min_val, &max_val, 0, 0 );
00097         for(int i=0; i<a_bins;i++ )
00098         {
00099                 for(int j=0; j<b_bins;j++ )
00100                 {
00101                         float bin_val = cvQueryHistValue_2D( h, i, j );
00102                         int index = (int)(NTEMPERATURES*(bin_val-min_val-1)/(max_val-min_val));
00103                         cvRectangle( frame, cvPoint( p.x+i*iscale, p.y+j*jscale ),
00104                                                 cvPoint( (i+1)*iscale - 1 + p.x, (j+1)*jscale - 1 + p.y),
00105                                                 CV_RGB(HEAT_COLOR[index].R, HEAT_COLOR[index].G, HEAT_COLOR[index].B), CV_FILLED );
00106                 }
00107         }
00108 }
00109 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00110 void LABHistogram2D::Draw(CDC* pDC) {
00111         CPen pen(PS_SOLID, 1, RGB(0, 0, 0));
00112         CPen* pOldPen = pDC->SelectObject(&pen);
00113 
00114         float min_value = 0, max_value = 0;
00115         cvGetMinMaxHistValue( h, &min_value, &max_value, 0, 0 );
00116         CRect box;
00117         pDC->GetWindow()->GetWindowRect(&box);
00118         int iscale = box.Width()/a_bins;
00119         int jscale = box.Height()/b_bins;
00120 
00121         for(int i=0; i<a_bins;i++ )
00122         {
00123                 for(int j=0; j<b_bins;j++ )
00124                 {
00125                         float bin_val = cvQueryHistValue_2D( h, i, j );
00126                         int intensity = cvRound((bin_val-min_value)*255/(max_value-min_value));
00127                         CBrush fill;
00128                         fill.CreateSolidBrush(RGB(0,0,intensity));   
00129                         CRect r(i*iscale, j*jscale, (i+1)*iscale - 1, (j+1)*jscale - 1);
00130                         pDC->FillRect(&r, &fill);
00131                 }
00132         }
00133         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00134 }

00137 double LABHistogram2D::Compare(const LABHistogram2D* that) {
00138         if( !CV_IS_HIST(h) || !CV_IS_HIST(that->h) )
00139         ASSERT(false);
00140         
00141         int size1[CV_MAX_DIM], size2[CV_MAX_DIM];
00142 
00143     int dims1 = cvGetDims( this->h->bins, size1 );
00144     int dims2 = cvGetDims( that->h->bins, size2 );
00145         int total = 1;
00146 
00147     if( dims1 != dims2 )
00148         ASSERT(false);
00149 
00150         for(int i = 0; i < dims1; i++ )
00151         {
00152                 if( size1[i] != size2[i] )
00153                         ASSERT(false);
00154                 total *= size1[i];
00155         }
00156 
00157         float *ptr1 = 0, *ptr2 = 0;
00158     cvGetRawData( this->h->bins, (uchar**)&ptr1 );
00159     cvGetRawData( that->h->bins, (uchar**)&ptr2 );
00160         float sum = 0, sum1 = 0, sum2 = 0;
00161     for(int i = 0; i < total; i++ )
00162     {
00163         float a = ptr1[i];
00164         float b = ptr2[i];
00165         sum += sqrt(a*b);
00166                 sum1 += a; sum2 +=b;
00167     }
00168 
00169         // normalize both histograms so that all bins sum up to 1
00170         if (sum1 == 0 || sum2 == 0)
00171                 return sum/1;
00172         return sum/sqrt(sum1*sum2);
00173 }
00174 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00175 double LABHistogram2D::GetNorm() {
00176     if( !CV_IS_HIST(h))
00177         ASSERT(false);
00178         
00179         int size[CV_MAX_DIM];
00180 
00181     int dims = cvGetDims( this->h->bins, size );
00182         int total = 1;
00183 
00184         for(int i = 0; i < dims; i++ )
00185                 total *= size[i];
00186 
00187         float *ptr = 0;
00188     cvGetRawData( this->h->bins, (uchar**)&ptr);
00189         float sum = 0;
00190     for(int i = 0; i < total; i++ )
00191                 sum += ptr[i];
00192 
00193         return sum;
00194 }
